name: rn-range-datepicker
description: rn-range-date-picker is a simple calendar which allows you to select date range. Suites for android and ios

scripts.bundle:android: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/

author: Aleksandr Protsenko
